feed.title: instant confirmation via payment protocol backwards compatible proto buffer extension

entry.title: instant confirmation via payment protocol backwards compatible proto buffer extension
entry.summary: There is a project called Certificate Transparency that seeks to make all certificates produced by Certification Authorities (CA's) public. This is achieved through the forced publication of all certificates made by CA's. Though this information is off-topic, it is worth checking out at http://www.certificate-transparency.org/.
